title: Induced emf increases linearly with time

content.prompt: A magnetic field perpendicular to the plane of a wire loop is uniform in space but changes with time t in the region of the loop. If the induced emf in the loop increases linearly with time t, then the magnitude of the magnetic field must be proportional to

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
